{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3559470,"name":"fovea1959","username":"fovea1959","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fovea1959/{size}/5301_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-17T17:48:59.505Z","cooked":"

Is there a current list of all the phoenix6 control frames and their default frequencies? We need to get our bus utilization down a bit.

I know I can do getAppliedUpdateFrequency() to figure it all out, but having a table already so we can pick off the low hanging fruit would be helpful.

I think generally it is 50hz.

For reducing bus utilization you can look this:

Phoenix 6

Status Signals

Signals represent live data reported by a device; these can be yaw, position, etc. To make use of the live data, users need to know the value, timestamp, latency, units, and error condition of the ...
